text: Abid Al-Hamid Mahmud al-Tikriti ( 21 September 1957 - June 7, 2012) was an Iraqi lieutenant general under Saddam Hussein's deposed regime, and he was Saddam's bodyguard. He was executed on June 7, 2012. Category:1957 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Executed people Category:Iraqi generals
title: Abid Hamid Mahmud
